variables.label: Trino Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/trinodb/trino/tags

instructions.start: Deploying Trino distributed SQL query engine.
instructions.end: Trino has been deployed! Visit http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain for the web UI. Query on port 8080.

description: Fast distributed SQL query engine. Query data anywhere from object storage to databases with ANSI SQL support.
